# Forbes Advisor Debt Relief - LLMs.txt
# Design System + Architecture Reference for AI Code Generation
# Theme: LLM (Forbes Lead Gen)
# Generated: January 24, 2026

## PROJECT OVERVIEW
- Product: Debt Relief Lead Generation Funnel
- Framework: React/Next.js with TypeScript
- Theme Source: LLM_tokens.json (Figma Variables Export)
- Design Reference: Figma file 1sqO0lh2jxFWhGuglu87Bb

## JOURNEY FLOW
1. Location Screen → State selector with US map
2. Type of Debt → Credit card, Loan, Both (radio selection)
3. Debt Amount → Slider with savings estimate calculator
4. Annual Income → Slider with debt projection
5. Date of Birth → Month/Date/Year dropdowns
6. Name → First Name, Last Name inputs
7. Debt Profile → Personalized results display
8. Email → Email input with validation
9. Phone Verification → Phone input with legal consent
10. Address → Street address with autocomplete

## KEY FILES (suggested structure)
- components/ui/Button.tsx

- components/layout/ProgressIndicator.tsx
- components/screens/*.tsx (one per journey step)
- styles/tokens.css (CSS variables)

## CRITICAL RULES
- ALL primary buttons use blue fill (#007AC8)
- Header shows "Secured by Forbes Advisor" branding
- Progress indicator shows 3 phases: "Your debt profile | Your details | Reduce your debt"
- Trust badges always visible at bottom: "Reduce your loan by 50%", "No impact on credit score", "Your data is safe with us"
- Back button top-left on all form screens
- Legal disclaimer text near phone/consent inputs
- Responsive: Desktop (side-by-side layout) and Mobile (stacked)

## COLORS (from LLM theme tokens)

### Primary Brand
primary-700 = #007AC8 (main brand, buttons, links)
primary-750 = #1E72A8 (hover state)
primary-800 = #0B5F95 (pressed/active state)
primary-300 = #ECF1FF (light brand background)
focus-ring = #80CAF4 (focus border)

### Secondary/Accent
secondary-500 = #F3C060 (gold/superlative highlights)
secondary-300 = #FEF9EF (cream background)

### Neutrals
black = #000000 (headings)
charcoal = #333333 (body text)
medium-grey = #6A6A6A (secondary text)
light-grey = #F8F8FA (input backgrounds)
light-neutral = #F3F5FB (hover states, table rows)
bright-grey = #ECF1FF (info backgrounds)
divider = #EDEDED (borders, separators)
white = #FFFFFF (backgrounds, button text)

### Feedback
error = #EB4015
warning = #FFB136
success = #0C7663

lg = 24px

```tsx

  children: React.ReactNode;
  onClick?: () => void;
  disabled?: boolean;
  fullWidth?: boolean;
  type?: 'button' | 'submit';
}

  backgroundColor: '#007AC8', // primary-700
```

## SCREEN-SPECIFIC CONTENT

### 1. Location Screen
- Headline: "See if You Qualify for Loan Free Debt Relief"
- Description: "Have more than 15K in credit card and loan debt? You can reduce what you owe and lower your payments by as much as 50%"
- UI: State dropdown + US map visualization
- Stats: "$5,000 Avg debt per customer" | "$4,000 Avg savings"
- CTA: "Continue"

### 2. Type of Debt
- Headline: "Tell us which kinds of these debts you have"
- Options: Credit card, Loan, Both (radio cards)
- Info: "Got mortgage, auto or student loan debts? How it works"
- CTA: None (auto-advance on selection)

### 3. Debt Amount
- Headline: "How much debt do you have?"
- Subhead: "You could reduce your debt amount by 50%"
- UI: Slider ($10K - $60K+) with live calculator
- Preview: "Your debt | New debt amount | Estimated savings | New monthly payments"
- CTA: "Tell Us About Your Income"

### 4. Annual Income
- Headline: "What is your annual income?"
- Description: "Please share your total income before taxes."
- Link: "Why we ask for this information?"
- UI: Slider ($10K/year - $200K+)
- Preview: "Your debt | New debt amount | New monthly payments"
- CTA: "Give Us Your Details"

### 5. Date of Birth
- Headline: "Your date of birth"
- Description: "Your birth date helps providers tailor offers that fit your financial situation and eligibility."
- UI: 3 dropdowns (Month, Date, Year)
- CTA: "Continue"

### 6. Name
- Headline: "Your name"
- Description: "Using your exact first and last name helps verify your identity and create your debt profile"
- UI: First Name, Last Name inputs
- CTA: "Continue"

### 7. Debt Profile (Results)
- Headline: "Here's your debt profile, {Name}"
- Subhead: "Your debt profile matches with more than 200,000 people..."
- UI: Donut chart, savings projection, timeline (24-48 Months)
- Stats: "3 million people helped" | "$300/month single bill"
- CTA: "Continue To See Your Options"

### 8. Email
- Headline: "What's your email?"
- Description: "Please share your email so we know where to send your debt relief plan"
- UI: Email input
- CTA: "Continue"

### 9. Phone Verification
- Headline: "Confirm Your phone number"
- Description: "Enter your phone number to confirm your identity..."
- UI: Phone input (with formatting)
- Legal: Spinwheel agreement, marketing consent, privacy statement checkboxes
- CTA: "Agree & Continue"

### 10. Address
- Headline: "Your Address"
- Description: "Your address helps us find the best debt relief options where you live"
- UI: Address line 1, Address line 2, Zip code
- CTA: "See Your Options"

## VALIDATION RULES
- Email: RFC 5322 compliant, required
- Phone: (###) ###-#### format, required
- DOB: Must be 18+ years old
- Name: Min 2 characters each field, letters only
- Debt amount: Min $10,000
- Income: Min $10,000/year
- Address: Zip code validation against state

## NEVER DO
- Use colors outside the LLM theme palette
- Skip the trust badges at bottom
- Remove the Forbes Advisor branding
- Make buttons square (always use border-radius: 8px)
- Use placeholder text in submitted inputs
- Auto-submit forms without user action
- Show phone keyboard for non-phone fields
- Disable back navigation

## ACCESSIBILITY
- All interactive elements keyboard accessible
- Focus states visible (2px #80CAF4 outline)
- Form errors announced to screen readers
- Color contrast minimum 4.5:1 for text
- Touch targets minimum 44x44px
- Labels associated with inputs via htmlFor/id
